Title: Ayurveda
Description: Ayurveda is a basic inventory management system for plants used in Ayurvedic medicine, the system includes a formula management system that tracks the plants used in the medicines. Built using SQL, ADO.NET Entity Data Model, WCF, WPF, .NET 3.5
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Ayurveda is a basic inventory management system for plants used in Ayurvedic medicine, the system includes a formula management system that tracks the plants used in the medicines. Built using SQL, ADO.NET Entity Data Model, WCF, WPF, .NET 3.5
